EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-03-27-Field-East-ESB-Nashville.Marketing Invite 2-28-18.EMAIL - Marketi
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Nashville Predators Private Game
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/exec-nashville/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
How are IT executives like you accelerating business growth and tackling challenges of scale in the hybrid cloud? Find out on March 27th during an exclusive cocktail hour and presentation by Oved Lourie (CTO of Turbonomic) hosted by Turbonomic at the Bridgestone Arena. Following our discussions we'll head to the Turbonomic private suite for food, drinks, and hockey as the Nashville Predators take on the Minnesota Wild.
Executive Networking Series Nashville Workload Automation for Your Hybrid Cloud Nashville Predators vs Minnesota Wild Tuesday, March 27th | Bridgestone Arena | 5:00 p.m.
<[[http://turbonomic.com/exec-nashville]]>
We hope to see you there,
Your friends at Turbonomic
